arStrings.szText: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} While {c_important}Call of the Ancients{/c} is on your Action Bar, damaging enemies with {c_important}Leap{/c}, {c_important}Upheaval{/c}, or {c_important}Whirlwind{/c} have up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to summon an Ancient to perform the same Skill.
